settings.heading: Art Yard Sale 2024
settings.text:
A selection of our artists have created a new release especially for the 2024 Art Yard Sale.

Browse this new collection exclusively available at Enter Gallery.

settings.link_section_content: Arthur | Babak Ganjei | Ben Rider | Benjamin Thomas Taylor | Bonnie and Clyde | Caroline Chinakwe | Cassandra Yap | CJP | Vintage Shuffle | Gavin Mitchell | Hannah Shillito | Hello Marine | Jana Nicole | Joe Webb | Kate Jenkins | Haus of Lucy | Magnus Gjoen | Marcelina Amelia | Maria Rivans | Mark Powell | Mike Edwards | Rebecca Strickson | Richard Berner | RYCA | Sara Pope | Sarah Arnett | Vintage Shuffle | Justine Smith | Zoe Funge Smith

settings.heading: Art Yard Sale
settings.text:
The Art Yard Sale is a fantastic community event that welcomes more than 30 internationally-renowned contemporary artists to Brighton.

One of the most exciting events on the Brighton Fringe calendar, the event takes place in Jubilee Square one a year.  

Subscribe to our mailing list to stay updated on the next Art Yard Sale.

settings.heading: Framing your purchases
settings.text:
On Sunday 2nd June you can also get 20% OFF all framing services on your Art Yard Sale purchases.

The discount will automatically be deducted at the checkout after you add your frame.

You can also find us on 13 Bond Street in Brighton where our expert framing consultants can help you add framing to your purchase.

settings.heading: CASH IS KING
settings.text:
Bring cash to spend at the Art Yard Sale!

Entry to the Art Yard Sale is free, but if you wish make a purchase, you will need to bring cash with you to exchange for Art Yard Sale money.

Please note: Art Yard Sale money is the only form of payment that artists will be able to accept on their stalls.

Simply exchange your cash with Enter Gallery staff upon arrival at the event.

You can also exchange your cash for Art Yard Sale money at Enter Gallery on Bond Street from 9am on the day.

Full Ts and Cs here.

settings.grid_section_content:
A highlight of Brighton Fringe, Enter Gallery’s Art Yard Sale is held in Jubilee Square once a year and grants you the unique opportunity to buy art directly from the artists that you love.

Each artist participating in the Art Yard Sale mans their own market stall stocked with their art. Expect to discover new pieces created exclusively for the event, alongside original works, smaller studies and rare finds.

Chat to your favourite artists, discover new talent, and see how it’s done, with live art displays happening throughout the day.

Subscribe to our mailing list here to stay updated on the 2024 Art Yard Sale.

Art Yard Sale ONLINE features a number of new released as timed releases, meaning the size of the limited edition is determined by the amount of people who purchase each artwork over the course of the weekend.

Over 72 hours these exclusive artworks are on sale at entergallery.com as well as being on display in our Brighton gallery.

Subscribe to our mailing list here to stay updated on Enter Gallery's Art Yard Sale.

settings.second_section_content:
You can only buy artworks at the Art Yard Sale with our special Art Yard money. This year it has been designed by Enter Gallery artist, Ryan Callanan (RYCA)

It's easy to exchange your cash for Art Yard Money on the day, at the event. Just head to the Art Yard Bank.

You can also beat the rush – and meet the artists faster – by exchanging your money in advance at Enter Gallery, Bond Street from 9am.

Unused Art Yard Money notes can be refunded at the Art Yard Sale site or at Enter Gallery until 5pm Sunday 2nd June.

Full terms and conditions here.

settings.grid_section_content:
You can only buy artworks at the Art Yard Sale with our special Art Yard money. This year it has been designed by Enter Gallery artist Sarah Arnett.

It's easy to exchange your cash for Art Yard Money on the day, at the event. Just head to the Art Yard Bank.

You can also beat the rush – and meet the artists faster – by exchanging your money in advance at Enter Gallery, Bond Street. Enter Gallery will also be accepting Art Yard Money until 5pm on 4th June.

Unused Art Yard Money notes can be refunded at the Art Yard Sale site or at Enter Gallery until 5pm Sunday 4 June.

Full terms and conditions here
